meanings.definition: A type of bacteria that can cause various diseases in humans and animals.
meanings.sent1: The rickettsiae spread through tick bites.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study rickettsiae to understand their impact on health.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rickettsiae played hide and seek in the laboratory.
meanings.sent4: The rickettsiae were like tiny invaders in the bloodstream.
meanings.sent5: The dangers of rickettsiae lurked in the shadows of the forest.
